verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In those days:
When Elijah came to Herob the mountain of God, he lodged into a cave;

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: and behold, the word of the Lord came to him, and he said, "Go forth, and stand upon the mount before the Lord."

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And behold, the Lord passed by, and a great and strong wind tore the mountains,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: and broke in pieces the rocks before the Lord, but the Lord was not in the wind;

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: and after the wind an earthquake, but the Lord was not in the earthquake; and after the earthquake a fire,

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: but the Lord was not in the fire; and after the fire a still small voice.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: And when Elijah heard it, he wrapped his face in his mantle and went out and stood at the entrance of the cave.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
The word of the Lord
All: Thanks be to God
